p: Results of the bioassays with the extracts showed that dichloromethane root extracts were the most active, reducing the number of parasites in the infected mouse blood by 97.4%; 11 other extracts were significantly active at the higher concentration tested (lysis% â‰¥ 50), while nine others presented lysis in the 60% to 80% range. Assays were performed with extract concentrations of 4 mg/mL.
